subtitle: my name is Derek Morton this is the
sixth day of counting the Omer today is
yasada of hessen your son can be
interpreted as bonding or formation
hessed his loving kindness and
benevolence a will to do good
let's reflect on bonding and loving
kindness on the sixth day of creation
God creates a human being in His image
he breathed the breath of life into our
nostrils he gave us his breath and
formed a bond with us the baby is
Created from bonding biologically the
seed and the Egg bond together as both
forms give up their old identity a new
being comes into existence
figuratively when we truly love and bond
and benevolently give a part of
ourselves to a relationship we are no
longer the person we once were we become
renewed the relationship becomes
refreshed and the other person we bond
with is rejuvenated
may your day be blessed with love and
bonding
